item.description:
4th July Wednesday (Holiday for Independence Day (United States))

http://www.foxwoods.com/sonunigam.aspx

I can get tickets for $39, $59 and $79. We should buy $39 tickets. Let me know if u r interested. It's a long drive.

Route to Casino:

Take I-95 South to Exit 92 in Connecticut. Go straight at the stoplight. At the next stoplight, turn right onto Route 2 West for eight miles. Take the Foxwoods Blvd exit.
Grand Pequot Tower - At the bottom of the exit bear right, take left at the second light
Great Cedar - At the bottom of the exit bear right, take left at the second light. Make left at first stop sign.
Two Trees - At the bottom of the exit go straight through light and take left at next light.
MGM Grand at Foxwoods - At the bottom of the exit bear right and take a left at the third light
Lake of Isles: - At the bottom of the exit bear right, take right at the second light
Drive time: 1 hour 45 minutes.
item.name: Sonu Nigam at Foxwoods Casino
